name: Jack Hyperspace Voyager
description:
---===JACK HYPERSPACE VOYAGER===---

-=CONTROLS=-

WASD - Move

Space - Jump

Left click - Close eyes   

**Note: eyes blink every 27 seconds**

-=HINTS=-

Collect all 8 embers

Each ember creates a stepping stone to move further

The game is over when you reach the boat

-=ASSETS=-

I used some premade assets (sounds): https://freesound.org/

This shader:

https://github.com/Kodrin/URP-PSX

And free images from this website: https://www.pexels.com/photo/textured-gray-ground-2931251/

And the first person controller was written by me before the jam 

-=MADE BY JACK=-

IN 3 DAYS FOR MINI JAM 101

-=VOYAGE ON=-
